title: Concord is Already Shutting Down - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.03.24
description:
Head over to Kindafunny.com/DragonAge to listen and subscribe to Dragon Age: Vows & Vengeance!

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Concord is going offline, Rocksteady’s been hit by layoffs, and what’s going on with Xbox game delays?

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
GAMESCAST - Blessing and Roger’s Japan journey 
Andy is streaming Deadlock on Twitch and YouTube
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway and watch Greg LIVE REACT to the Concord cancelation.
And you can get the Kinda Funny Podcast this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Delaney Twining & Karl Jacobs

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:43 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:05:28 - An important update on Concord - Ryan Ellis (Game Director, Firewalk Studios) @ PS Blog
00:31:10 - Rocksteady hit by layoffs after Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League underperforms - Tom Phillips @ Eurogamer
00:45:15 - A Block of Xbox Delays and Updates
00:52:40 -  Bringing Dune Awakening to the Xbox Series S will be a "challenge", according to Funcom chief product officer - Conor Makar @ VG247
00:54:10 - Special Guest MegaRan comes by the studio!
01:01:40 - Capcom fighting games are now coming to Xbox! (next year)
01:05:30 - Wee News!
01:06:52 - You‘re Wrong
